text: Curtis Charles Stone (November 19, 1922 July 30, 2021) was an American long- distance runner. He competed in the 5000 m event at the 1948, 1952 and 1956 Olympics. His best Olympic result was sixth place in 1948. He was born in Brooklyn, Pennsylvania. Stone died on July 30, 2021, at The KentRidge Senior Living in Kent, Ohio, at the age of 98.Curtis Stone obituary ==References== ==Other websites== *Curt Stone at Sports-Reference.com Category:1922 births Category:2021 deaths Category:1948 Summer Olympics Category:1952 Summer Olympics Category:1956 Summer Olympics Category:American long-distance runners Category:Olympians for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Pennsylvania
title: Curt Stone
